law.text: The cabinet may disburse any and all funds appropriated by the Legislature for purposes consistent with KRS 65.510 to 65.530, 139.483, 154.80-100, and 154.80-110 to 154.80-130, any funds received from any state agency, and may apply for, receive, and disburse funds from the federal government, or any other public or private organization or agency for carrying out the purposes of KRS 65.510 to 65.530, 139.483, 154.80-100, and 154.80-110 to 154.80-130.
law.history: Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 105, sec. 39, effective July 14, 1992. -- Created 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 64, sec. 11.
